title: Service-connected disability retirement allowance
context: ยง88-337 Service-connected disability retirement allowance. Upon retirement for service-connected disability, a class H member shall receive the amount of the member&rsquo;s accumulated contributions and a maximum retirement allowance of thirty-five per cent of the member&rsquo;s average final compensation. [L 2004, c 179, pt of ยง1; am L 2005, c 58, ยง29]
